name: GCDevice
desc: A protocol that defines a common interface for game input devices.

items.name: var vendorName: String?
items.desc: The manufacturer-provided name for the device, or the user’s name for the device.

items.name: var productCategory: String
items.desc: The product category that identifies the type of controller.

items.name: var handlerQueue: DispatchQueue
items.desc: The dispatch queue that the framework uses to call element value change handlers.

items.name: var physicalInputProfile: GCPhysicalInputProfile
items.desc: The device’s physical input profile, such as a controller’s extended gamepad.
